document_data.caption: A map showing Tomrav near the Earthwood.
document_data.name: Tomrav
document_data.mainbody: '''Tomrav''' was a small mining settlement found high in the [[Earthspur Mountains]] in southern [[Arcata]].
document_data.Activities: Tomrav was able to survive by getting along with their neighbors, including monks from the [[Monastery of the Yellow Rose]] as well as various [[goblin|goblinoid]] tribes.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Human]]s, [[dwarves]], and [[half-orc]]s made up most of the population of Tomrav. The resident half-orcs helped maintain positive relations with the local goblinoid tribes.
